item.title: Two men still missing after Christmas swim as coastguard calls off search
item.description: After "extensive" searches, the coastguard says its part of the search has been stood down.

item.title: Last dance for Tess and Claudia as Strictly hosts sign off
item.description: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman embrace on the dancefloor as they sign off as hosts after 11 years.

item.title: Brazil ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's surgery for hernia 'successful'
item.description: The former leader is serving a 27-year sentence for plotting a coup after losing the 2022 presidential election.

item.title: Murder arrest after death of woman in her 80s
item.description: A 63-year-old woman has been arrested following an incident at a flat in Devizes.

item.title: Royal Family greet crowds after Christmas Day service
item.description: The King and Queen attend a church service alongside other family members, including Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's daughters Princesses Beatrice and Eu...
